snippet.title: Brisbane traffic delays after Story Bridge crash
snippet.content: Traffic has been delayed heading into the city over the Story Bridge, after two cars crashed during peak hour. Emergency services were called to the scene at 5.40pm after two cars crashed on the inbound middle lane, a police spokesman said.Photo: Leah Kidd Police were still on scene at 6.40pm, and all inbound lanes were affected. As well as the Story Bridge, traffic on Shafston Avenue and Wynnum Road was also affected by the incident. The police spokesman said no one was injured in the crash.
